description:
Naw, I'm not gonna just smother you with solos during the End of Your Blow Out!
Teo clearly is one of my favorite guys to work with. He's always eager, turned on, and ready to take it up the ass and then bust a nut.
I was thinking of doing a DVD dedicated to all his films, and this video was likely gonna be a bonus scene instead of him making an appearance on the site.
But like I said in the first sentence, I didn't want this End of Year thang to be solos only, so it got moved to web consumption.
This is a pretty solid video, and it just astounds me that Teo can take Maverick's fat cock.
Maverick even offered, on his own suggestion, to jerk off Teo for a bit. His steel shell is hard to crack. But for once I think he was having real fun.
Fortunately, their nuts not as hard to crack. I put the two of them in a dueling position and barely got my cameras there in time. Teo busts first, and a giant glob hits Maverick's arm. I was thinking, "Shit, that will freak him out." and he will lose his steam.
But just like Maverick had been in a circle jerk before (which I doubt seriously) his dick dumps a load of milky goodness almost at the same time as Teo!
These two have both come a long way!
title: Maverick & Teo - Wrapped
